data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 4,737,803 who are far from you in Haora, West Bengal, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Haora, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Haora, West Bengal, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Haora, West Bengal, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Haora to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Bedia (Hindu traditions) people. Make the Bedia (Hindu traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, the believers in the county of Haora, West Bengal, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Haora, West Bengal, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Haora, West Bengal, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
